author: hyrmes
title: Catalyst Snippets via Social Media
description: Catalyst requires an educated voting body. However many ADA holders are not active in voting rounds, nor do they understand the proposals.
solution: Create a social media brand not affiliated with IOG/Emurgo/etc which discuss catalyst questions and proposals in easily digestible posts.
experience: Amateur hobbyist in vector graphic design, significant professional experience explaining technical concepts to non-technical audiences.
